source_note: State baseline derived from Montana DEQ guidance; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: No statewide organics mandate; backyard and site-permitted composting allowed per DEQ guidance.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste cart or drop-off where offered.
organics.notes: Acceptance of food scraps varies by city/county.
provenance: Montana DEQ Solid Waste & Composting guidance

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or local drop-off.

glass_containers.guidance: Glass bottles/jars only; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Separate glass or drop-off if available.

metal_containers.guidance: Aluminum and steel/tin cans, empty and rinsed.
metal_containers.notes: No pressurized/aerosol cans unless specifically accepted.

plastics.guidance: Bottles, jugs, and some tubs as accepted locally.
plastics.notes: No film, bags, or foam in curbside bins.

household_batteries.guidance: Handle under universal-waste best practices; recycle rechargeables/lead-acid.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of trash and curbside recycling.

e_waste.guidance: Use e-waste collection events or electronics recyclers.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary by site; wipe data before recycling.

plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to retail/store drop-offs if available.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule special pickup or haul to transfer station/landfill.
bulky_items.notes: Fees and rules vary by jurisdiction.
provenance: Local solid-waste program rules in MT
